name: Shooty Ballz
description:
A game about shooting some ballz.

A Twin Stick Shooter with a bit of a twist! Your objective is to protect the green ball.. from yourself! Shoot EVERYTHING Except the green ball.

Pay attention to your Control Gauge. If it runs out, you will go Out of Control. 

Pink balls will combine into a bigger, aggressive Big Red ball if they come into contact with one another. 

Pink balls spawn yellow eggs when killed. These will hatch new Balls if left alone for too long. Collect the Yellow Eggs to replenish Control, or shoot them.

How To Play:

WASD - Move

Mouse Move - Aim 

Left Click - Fire Laser

Space - Dash

Right Click - Knockaway Bomb


...and for those who like to fly close to the sun: 

Q - Force yourself to Lose Control
